genbank:Reference.genbank:title: Bidirectional approaches for optogenetic regulation of gene expression in mammalian cells using Arabidopsis cryptochrome 2.

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: CRY2
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: binds to CIB1 upon exposure to blue light (Kennedy et al., 2010)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: CRY2

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: CRY-Gal∆DD (B1013) was a gift from Chandra Tucker (Addgene plasmid # 92035 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:92035 ; RRID:Addgene_92035)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: mCherry
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: monomeric derivative of DsRed fluorescent protein (Shaner et al., 2004)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: mCherry

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: vertebrate consensus sequence for strong initiation of translation (Kozak, 1987)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: vertebrate consensus sequence for strong initiation of translation (Kozak, 1987)
f1 bacteriophage origin of replication; arrow indicates direction of (+) strand synthesis
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: f1 ori
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: f1 ori

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:modificationsToBackbone: IRES element between end of mCherry and SacI sites
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:threeCloningSite: Not1 between linker of CRY2 and Gal4 BD (not destroyed)
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:entrezGene:
CRY2
(a.k.a. AT1G04400, AT-PHH1, ATCRY2, CRYPTOCHROME 2 APOPROTEIN, F19P19.14, F19P19_14, FHA, PHH1, cryptochrome 2)
sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Expresses CRY2 (full-length, with endogenous NLS) fused to Gal4 (aa1-65 of Gal4BD), downstream of mCherry-IRES.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refBib: Bidirectional approaches for optogenetic regulation of gene expression in mammalian cells using Arabidopsis cryptochrome 2. Pathak GP, Spiltoir JI, Hoglund C, Polstein LR, Heine-Koskinen S, Gersbach CA, Rossi J, Tucker CL. Nucleic Acids Res. 2017 Apr 20. doi: 10.1093/nar/gkx260. 10.1093/nar/gkx260 PubMed 28431041

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: pBABE 3'
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: pBABE 3'
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: SV40 enhancer, reverse primer for pBABE vectors

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: NeoR/KanR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: confers resistance to neomycin, kanamycin, and G418 (Geneticin(R))
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: NeoR/KanR

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:purpose: Expresses CRY2 (full-length, with endogenous NLS) fused to Gal4 (aa1-65 of Gal4BD), downstream of mCherry-IRES

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Human CMV immediate early promoter, forward primer
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: CMV-F
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: CMV-F

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:mutation: Fusion of plant CRY2 to Gal4 binding domain (AA1-65), downstream of mCherry-IRES element
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:academicNonprofitTerms: UBMTA Takara Bio Limited Use Label License (formerly Clontech)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: HSV TK poly(A) signal
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: HSV TK poly(A) signal
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: herpes simplex virus thymidine kinase polyadenylation signal (Cole and Stacy, 1985)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: KS primer
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: common sequencing primer, one of multiple similar variants
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: KS primer
